name: Sapa Hostel Hanoi
address: Alley No.186, No.7 Tran Duy Hung, Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Well-positioned in Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Sapa Hostel Hanoi is the ideal point of departure for your excursions in Hanoi. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

The facilities and services provided by Sapa Hostel Hanoi ensure a pleasant stay for guests. This hotel offers numerous on-site facilities to satisfy even the most discerning guest.

In addition, all guestrooms feature a variety of comforts. Many rooms even provide towels, internet access – wireless, toiletries, shower to please the most discerning guest. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Sapa Hostel Hanoi is a smart choice for travelers to Hanoi, offering a relaxed and hassle-free stay every time.
